quotes.quote: Like a welcome summer rain, humor may suddenly cleanse and cool the earth, the air and you.
Advice is like a stranger--if welcome, he stays the night; if not welcome, he returns home that day.
Sometimes the hurdles aren't really hurdles at all. They're welcome challenges, tests.
All living souls welcome whatever they are ready to cope with; all else they ignore, or pronounce to be monstrous and wrong, or deny to be possible.
The soul should always stand ajar, ready to welcome the ecstatic experience.
A smile is the universal welcome.
Beauty is everywhere a welcome guest.
If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant: if we did not sometimes taste of adversity, prosperity would not be so welcome.
Large corporations welcome innovation and individualism in the same way the dinosaurs welcomed large meteors.
Clouds can never hide the sun forever; so don't complain about clouds but never forget to welcome the sun.
Welcome those big, sticky, complicated problems. In them are your most powerful opportunities.
We must welcome the future, remembering that soon it will be the past; and we must respect the past, remembering that it was once all that was humanly possible.
Welcome anything that comes to you, but do not long for anything else.
You must welcome change as the rule but not as your ruler.
A table full of welcome makes scarce one dainty dish.
The advice that is wanted is commonly not welcome and that which is not wanted, evidently an effrontery.
Despise not death, but welcome it, for nature wills it like all else.
No one can be so welcome a guest that he will not annoy his host after three days.
There are people who come into our lives as welcome as a cool breeze in summer- and last about as long.
Small cheer and great welcome makes a merry feast.
This being human is a guest house. Every morning a new arrival. Welcome and entertain them all! -
Compromise is the welcome mat to deception.
Think to yourself that every day is your last; the hour to which you do not look forward will come as a welcome surprise.
Welcome the challenges. Look for the opportunities in every situation to learn and grow in wisdom.
The truth is seldom welcome, especially at dinner.
We welcome passion, for the mind is briefly let off duty
Because no one needs to live for ever. I think that sometimes you can outstay your welcome.
There is no friend like an old friend who has shared our morning days, no greeting like his welcome, no homage like his praise.
Welcome to the free world. We give people the power to choose. They can even choose the wrong thing. Beautiful, isn't it?
When you're locked up in here for life, you learn to welcome the little freedoms.
